name: doot (an epic puzzle platformer)
description: doot is a game based on the most spoop meme EVER! it has an interesting mechanic: you cant jump. but if you go on a slope, you DO jump! the angle and height of the slope change the distance jumped. collect the noteblocks, but if you see an item other than a noteblock, prepare for a BOSS BATTLE! every level is short, but ill add more levels.
